text: A Tango Tragedy is a 1914 American silent comedy film featuring Oliver Hardy. ==Cast== * Billy Bowers - Pat Muldune * Frances Ne Moyer - Nora Muldune * James Hodges - Dick Kelly * Raymond McKee - Bill Ryan * Julia Calhoun - The Widow * Oliver Hardy - (as Babe Hardy) ==See also== * List of American films of 1914 * Oliver Hardy filmography ==External links== * Category:1914 films Category:American films Category:American silent short films Category:American comedy films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1914 comedy films Category:1914 short films Category:Comedy short films
title: A Tango Tragedy
